OrgName.entry: LANGSETT ADVICE AND AREA RESOURCE CENTRE FREE LEGAL ADVICE SESSION

Desc.entry: Run in conjunction with Sheffield University Law Department offering initial legal advice and information on wills, probate, family problems, employment, housing, personal injury, criminal offences, consumer problems etc. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 6.30-8pm, please ring around 5pm and listen to the message left on the answerphone to check availability
